Now

Here’s a brief look at what I’m up to right now:

  • Working through fast.ai’s Practical Deep Learning for Coders MOOC to get hands on exposure to machine learning.
  • Steadily stepping through Project Rosalind to keep stretching my brain and working on my programming skills.

Reading:
